episodes.summary: At his wife's urging, David reluctantly attends his high school reunion -- which becomes a crime scene when the bitchy former high school queen is found dead in a back room.

episodes.title: Sheltered
episodes.summary: When a young camper is stalked and slain in a remote area populated by Doomsday Preppers, the team investigates an underground bunker that holds several shocking surprises.

episodes.title: Backfire
episodes.summary: When the CSIs investigate a triple homicide, Russell has to find a way to connect with a 6-year-old girl who was the sole survivor and witness.

episodes.title: Fearless
episodes.summary: When a body is found in the 'sacred mud bath' at a Force of Mind seminar, the team must sift through some byzantine motives to catch a killer.

episodes.title: Ghost of the Past
episodes.summary: A brutal murder at a haunted house (formerly owned by a vicious serial killer) leads the CSI team to probe the boundaries of the supernatural.

episodes.title: Skin in the Game
episodes.summary: The CSI team needs to brush up on their Medieval Italian, because 'Dante's Inferno' is the text chosen for illustration by a particularly twisted homicidal maniac.

episodes.title: The Devil and D.B. Russell
episodes.summary: With Morgan and Ellie's lives on the line, the CSIs race to stop a serial killer from completing his twisted homage to 'Dante's Inferno.'

episodes.title: Take the Money and Run
episodes.summary: A complex casino heist has the CSIs scratching their heads.

episodes.title: Torch Song
episodes.summary: When the smoke from a nightclub fire clears away and four dead bodies are revealed, the CSI team goes looking for an amateur arsonist.

episodes.title: Last Supper
episodes.summary: The name of the hit cooking show, 'Slice and Dice,' takes on a grim new meaning when a sliced-and-diced former contestant is incorporated into a 'special challenge.'

episodes.title: Frame by Frame
episodes.summary: When a young woman is found dead in reclusive mogul mansion, the team thinks it's a repeat of a decade-old murder, also involving the mogul: Mr. Witten. But the twists and turns of the case take them in surprising directions they had never anticipated.

episodes.title: Passed Pawns
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates the death of a homeless man who had a huge winning streak at a small casino.

episodes.title: Under a Cloud
episodes.summary: A man pulled from a flood channel with a bomb in his backpack wakes up speaking a foreign language, and Greg struggles to recall a case from 2006 that may threaten his future as a CSI.

episodes.title: Helpless
episodes.summary: The discovery of a bludgeoned, bloody corpse inside a 'human hamster ball' (a six-foot tall, clear plastic ball) has the CSIs scratching their heads.

episodes.title: Check In and Check Out
episodes.summary: A series of grisly but apparently unrelated murders, which all take place in the same seedy motel room, have the team wondering if the room really is a demonic an deadly site that 'possesses' its inhabitants.

episodes.title: Girls Gone Wild
episodes.summary: A spa weekend for Sara, Finlay and Morgan turns into a murder investigation and missing persons case when Finlay disappears, as the CSI team must piece together what happened in detail to find her.

episodes.title: Lost Reindeer
episodes.summary: When a man is found murdered at an elaborate holiday party complete with real snow and live reindeer, the CSI team is brought in to investigate.

episodes.title: Keep Calm and Carry-on
episodes.summary: An inbound plane's passengers become the victims of an onboard thief, but when one of the passengers is found dead, the petty crime turns into a murder investigation.

episodes.title: Boston Brakes
episodes.summary: The CSIs are called to investigate a car crash and are shocked to discover the victim is someone they know.

episodes.title: De Los Muertos
episodes.summary: When the CSI team works two separate investigations, one involving a woman found murdered in Mexico and another of a local couple found dead in their driveway, they find the evidence in one case may help the other.

episodes.title: Love For Sale
episodes.summary: Nick and Greg investigate the death of a 16-year-old girl with ties to a brothel.

episodes.title: Killer Moves
episodes.summary: The CSIs investigate the murders of an Elvis impersonator and a bird that are strangely connected.

episodes.title: Long Road Home
episodes.summary: The CSIs investigate the murder of a rock and roll groupie and the disappearance of a prostitute that both have ties to a mysterious band.

episodes.title: Uninvited
episodes.summary: The CSIs are called to investigate when an entire family is reported to have been missing for a month.

episodes.title: The Fallen
episodes.summary: Russell is taken hostage after a teenager opens fire in a police station.

episodes.title: Consumed
episodes.summary: A killer with a taste for human flesh appears to be preying on people who fantasize about being devoured. A group of vorarephiliacs -- someone who is fixated on eating, or being eaten by, other living beings. Meanwhile, an experienced retired sheriff has coffee with Ecklie and gives him some career advice.

episodes.title: Kitty
episodes.summary: ''Spin-Off Episode'': The murder of a casino mogul's wife grabs the attention of Avery Ryan, the brilliant Special Agent in Charge of the FBI's Cyber Crime Division in D.C.

episodes.title: Dead In His Tracks
episodes.summary: The CSIs investigate a present-day crime with ties to a mob heist that occurred 25 years ago. Meanwhile, Brass has a decision to make when his daughter attempts suicide.

episodes.title: The CSI Effect
episodes.summary: A notorious serial slayer, brought to justice by Russell years ago, faces imminent execution -- until a cunning copycat casts his guilt into serious doubt -- and casts a shadow over Russell's previous investigation.

episodes.title: Buzz Kill
episodes.summary: When a marijuana dispensary owner's wife and children are abducted, the team launches an investigation to track the victims -- not knowing whether they are still alive or not.

episodes.title: Bad Blood
episodes.summary: Sara and Greg are quarantined after responding to a crime scene thats contaminated with a deadly pathogen.

episodes.title: The Book Of Shadows
episodes.summary: The CSI team suspects foul play when a chemistry teachers science experiment goes horribly wrong.

episodes.title: Girls Gone Wilder
episodes.summary: 'Morgan, Sidle and Finlay try to relax at a forensics conference when a mass shooting occurs on site.

episodes.title: The Twin Paradox
episodes.summary: Frustration mounts for the CSI team as another victim surfaces and all evidence points to the Gig Harbor Killer.

episodes.title: Road To Recovery
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates the death of a woman full of alcohol and drugs in a pool at a rehab facility.

episodes.title: Rubbery Homicide
episodes.summary: The CSI team delves into the kinky world of rubber dolls when they investigate the murder of a man stabbed in an alley.

episodes.title: Let's Make A Deal
episodes.summary: The CSIs investigate a murder at the Clark County jail after an inmate stumbles upon a body while running away from officers.

episodes.title: Dead Rails
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates the bizarre death of a man who was killed not once, but twice.

episodes.title: Angle of Attack
episodes.summary: The CSIs investigation of the victim of an apparent hit and run leads them into the world of aeronautics.

episodes.title: Dead Woods
episodes.summary: The CSI team reopens a 10-year-old murder/suicide case when the sole survivor claims her accused father was innocent.

episodes.title: The Greater Good
episodes.summary: The CSI team learns the main suspect in the gig harbor killings is being released from jail due to lack of evidence.

episodes.title: Merchants of Menace
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates a homicide at a convention for people who collect macabre murder memorabilia.

episodes.title: Hero to Zero
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates the murder of a young victim dressed as a superhero.

episodes.title: The Last Ride
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates a death involving a vintage car and a chrome-covered victim.

episodes.title: Under My Skin
episodes.summary: The CSI team investigates a murder with ties to two teenaged kidnapped girls.

episodes.title: The End Game
episodes.summary: The CSI unit faces the final showdown with the Gig Harbor killer whose motives are finally revealed. Also, Nick Stokes makes a decision that will affect the entire team moving forward.

episodes.title: Immortality (Part 1)
episodes.summary: Grissom and Willows return to help the CSI team solve a catastrophic case that paralyzes all of Las Vegas.

episodes.title: Immortality (Part 2)
episodes.summary: Is Lady Heather the victim in the mysterious bombings or is she the perpetrator?
